SA01n792:2: svabhāva strayaḥ svabhāvāḥ parikalpitaḥ paratantraḥ pariniṣpannaśca ||
SA01n792:6: pravṛttihetustadyathā'vidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvatsamudayo nirodhaśca bhavatītyetayā''nupūrvyā saṃkleśavyavadānapravṛtteḥ |
SA01n792:11: niṣpandaphalaṃ tadyathā pūrvotpannānāṃ kuśalādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tatsāntānikā uttara kuśalādayo dharmāḥ |
SA01n792:15: yogārthaḥ pañca yogāḥ sāmūhiko yogasta dyathā gṛhakāṣṭheṣṭakādīnām |
SA01n792:20: tathāhi tāsu vartamānaḥ sukhena yukto yāvadduḥkhāsukhena yukta ityucyate |
SA01n792:22: tathāhi tasmin sati rāgādibhiḥ śraddhādibhiśca yukta ityucyate ||
SA01n792:31: sa punaḥ parijñeyavastvādīnāṃ ṣaṣṇāmarthānāṃ pratisūtraṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ pratipādanāt |
SA01n792:42: aṅgopāṅgamukhaṃ yatraikena padenoddeśaḥ śeṣairnirdeśa iti pradarśyate |
SA01n792:44: uttarottara nirhāramukhaṃ yatrottarasyottarasyābhinirharaṇāśrayatvādette dharmā evaṃ deśitā iti pradarśyate |
SA01n792:50: pratikṣepamukhaṃ yatredamāra bhyedaṃ pratikṣipyata iti pradarśyate |
SA01n792:51: tadyathā vāsyaupamyasūtre āsravakṣayamārabhya catvāraḥ pudgalāḥ pratikṣipyante |
SA01n792:52: ito bāhyaka ihadhārmikaḥ śrutacintāmātrasaṃtuṣṭaḥ bhāvanāyāṃ paritasyamāno 'paripūrṇasaṃbhāraśca |
SA01n792:53: jānataścāhaṃ bhikṣavaḥ paśyataścāstravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ vadāmītyevamādinā sūtrakhaṇḍenādyaḥ pudgalaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ |
SA01n792:66: tatro bhayato vatāyaṃ sujātaḥ kulaputraḥ śobhate yacca keśaśmaśrūṇyavahārya yāvat pravrajito yaccāstravāṇāṃ kṣayādyāvatprajānāmītyanenāpraṇāśata dupāyāpadeśena tadviparītalakṣaṇa praṇāśatadupāyau sūcitau bhavataḥ |
SA01n792:67: apraṇāśaprabhedo gāthānugītena darśitaḥ - “ śobhate vata bhikṣurayamupaśānto nirāśrava“ iti |
SA01n792:71: dhārayatyanti maṃ dehaṃ jitvā mārasya vāhinīm ||
SA01n792:79: tadyathā audakopame sūtre dvividhau pudgalau tricatuḥprabhedāna dhikṛtya bhāṣitam - pṛthagjanaṃ dṛṣṭasatyaṃ ca |
SA01n792:86: tadyathā'nityasūtre - yaḥ sadidaṃ samanupaśyati sarvo'sau rūpaṃ samanupaśyati,
SA01n792:87: yo vā rūpaṃ samanupaśyati sarvaḥ sa sadidaṃ samanupaśyatīti catuṣkoṭikaḥ |
SA01n792:89: dvitīyā koṭī rūpaṃ nityaśucisukhātmaviparyāsaiḥ samāropyāparijñeyāprahātavyaṃ ca samanupaśyataḥ |
SA01n792:90: tṛtīyā koṭī rūpaṃ nityaśucisukhātma viparyāsairasamāropya parijñeyaprahātavyāṃśca samanupaśyataḥ caturthīkoṭirvedanādīṃścaturaḥ skandhānnityaśucisukhātmaviparyāsaiḥ samāropyāparijñeyāprahātavyaṃ ca samanupaśyataḥ |
SA01n792:91: yathā rūpe catuṣkoṭika evaṃ vedanādau sarvatra vistareṇa draṣṭavyam |
SA01n792:92: yāvadyasya kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ sarvaḥ sa nāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāti,
SA01n792:93: yāvannāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāti sarvasya tasya kṛtaṃ karaṇīyam |
SA01n792:99: nayamukhaṃ yatra ṣaḍbhirnayairartho varṇyate - tattvārthanayena prāptinayena deśanānayenāntadva yavivarjanānayenāci ntyanayenābhiprāyanayena ca |
SA01n792:100: eṣāṃ ca ṣaṇṇāṃ nayānāṃ pūrvakāstrayo nayā uttaraistribhirnayairyathākramamanugantavyāḥ |
SA01n792:101: tadyathā''svādanasūtre - asti bhikṣavaḥ rūpe āsvāda ityevamādinā'pavādāntaṃ samāropāntaṃ ca varjayitvā tattvārthanayo'bhidyotitaḥ |
SA01n792:104: skandha mātre saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ cānātmanīti pradarśayatā yāvaccāhaṃ bhikṣavaḥ yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho'smītyadhyajñāsiṣa mityanena prāptinayo'cintyanayena paridīpitaḥ,
SA01n792:115: tena prakāreṇa tasya rūpādikasya vastunaḥ parijñānāt |
SA01n792:132: āvaraṇaprahāṇe nāśrayaparivṛttisākṣātkaraṇāt bhāvanālakṣaṇaṃ viparyāsāpagatena cetasā bahulavihāraḥ |
SA01n792:133: prakārabhedalakṣaṇam -- tattvalakṣaṇasya pañcadhā bhedo rūpaṃ yāvadvijñānamiti |
SA01n792:134: parijñālakṣaṇasya tridhā bheda āsvādaṃ cāsvādayato yāvanniḥsaraṇaṃ ca niḥsarato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
SA01n792:136: tatra sadevakāllokādyāvatsadeva mānuṣāyāḥ prajāyā vimuktiḥ kleśebhyo vimokṣādata eva tadviśeṣa ṇārthamāha niḥsṛta iti |
SA01n792:139: evamanāgataduḥkhābhinirvartaka kleśavisaṃyoge sati duḥkhādapi vipramukto bhavatīti viśeṣaṇārthamāha - visaṃyukto vipramukta iti |
SA01n792:148: balābalamukhaṃ yatraike na padenānucyamānenāyamartho na gamitaḥ syāditi pratyekaṃ sarveṣāṃ padānāṃ sāmarthya pradarśyate |
SA01n792:151: eṣāṃ ca padānāṃ pratyekaṃ sāmarthya pūrvavadveditavya yathā pratītyasamutpādasya lakṣaṇanirdeśe ||
SA01n792:152: pratyāhāramukhaṃ yatra sūtrasyaikaṃ padaṃ gṛhītvā vistareṇārthaḥ pratinirdiśyate |
SA01n792:153: tadyathā ṣaḍbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bhikṣurhimava ntamapi parvatarājaṃ mukhavāyunā cālayet,
SA01n792:156: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuścittasyotpādakuśalo bhavati iha bhikṣurviviktaṃ kāmai ryāvaccaturthadhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati |
SA01n792:159: iha bhikṣurāsevanānvayādyaddhā nabhāgīyaṃ dhyānaṃ tat sthitibhāgīyaṃ karoti |
SA01n792:161: kathaṃ ca bhikṣurvyutthānakuśalo bhavati iha bhikṣurāsevanānvayādya tsthitibhāgīyaṃ dhyānaṃ tadviśeṣabhāgīyaṃ karoti |
SA01n792:164: iha bhikṣuranutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmiti vistareṇa dve samyakprahāṇe |
SA01n792:167: iha hi bhikṣurutpannānāṃ pāpakā nāmakuśalānāmiti vistareṇa dve samyakprahāṇe |
SA01n792:170: iha hi bhikṣuśchandasamādhipradhāna saṃskārasamanvāgatamṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayatīti vistareṇa catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ |
SA01n792:173: teṣvapi catuṣkādiṣvekaikaṃ padamaparaiścatuṣkādibhiraparyanto hi nirhāro veditavyaḥ |
SA01n792:174: tadyathā buddhākṣepasūtre - catvāra ime bodhisattvānāṃ bodhipariśodha kā dharmāḥ - śūnyatāḥ bhāvanā,
SA01n792:178: catuṣkaḥ svārtha paramārtha cārabhya bodhipariśodhanāya caturvipakṣapratipakṣeṇa veditavyaḥ |
SA01n792:187: aparaḥ paryāyaḥ - prathamena jñānasaṃbhārastribhiḥ puṇyasaṃbhāraḥ paridīpitaḥ,
SA01n792:192: caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvāḥ śūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti - adhyātmaṃ cittāvikaṃpanatayādhimuktipravicayabalādhānatayā,
SA01n792:195: yadāśritya yathā ca bhāvayanti tadetena paridīpitam |
SA01n792:200: catubhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvāḥ sarvasattve ṣvapratihatacittā bhavanti maitrībhāvanayā,
SA01n792:204: atrāpi yadāśritya yathā cāpratihatacitā bhavanti tatparidīpitaṃ bhavati |
SA01n792:211: caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā bodhisattvānāṃ nityaṃ hitamupasaṃharanti - ātmanaḥ paritulanatayā,
SA01n792:220: caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā nirāmiṣeṇa cittena dharmadānaṃ saṃprakāśayanti - antarāyasukhaprativedha tayā,
SA01n792:229: sa mādāpanataḥ samuttejana taśca pramādasaṅgānātmaparibhavena vā līnānām,
SA01n792:233: prabhidyasaṃdarśana[vi]niścayo yathānirdiṣṭeṣu skandhādiṣu dharmeṣu yathāyogamekāvacārakādīni | tatra -
SA01n792:234: ekāvacārako nāma praśno yenaikaṃ dharma pariśiṣṭaiḥ saha pratyekaṃ praśnayitvā tamapahāya dvitīyaṃ tenānyaiśca saha praśnayatyevamekaikasyaiva sarvān praśnayati |
SA01n792:236: yo vā rūpāyatanena cakṣurāyatanenāpi sa iti pūrvapādakaḥ |
SA01n792:237: yaścakṣurāyatanena samanvāgataḥ śrotrāyatanenāpi sa ityatra catuṣkoṭikam |
SA01n792:238: evaṃ yāvanmanaāyatanenāpi sa ityatra yathā yogaṃ yojayitavyam |
SA01n792:241: yo vā cakṣurāyatanena rūpāyatanenāpi sa iti paścātpādakaḥ |
SA01n792:242: yo rūpāyatanena samanvāgataḥ śrotrāyatanenāpi sa ityatra cāpi paścātpādakaḥ |
SA01n792:244: yaḥ śrotrāyatanena samanvāgataścakṣurāyatanenāpi sa ityatra catuṣkoṭikam |
SA01n792:247: pūrvapādakaṃ dvayordharmayoḥ kathaṃcideva dharmamārabhya parasparaṃ pṛṣṭayoḥ pūrvadharmamadhiṣṭhāya yadvayākriyate |
SA01n792:248: tadyathā yajjñānaṃ jñeyamapi tadyadvā jñeyaṃ jñānamapi taditi |
SA01n792:252: paścātpādakaṃ tathaiva dvayordharmayoḥ parasparaṃ pṛṣṭayoryatpaścimamadhiṣṭhāya vyākriyate |
SA01n792:253: tadyathā yadgrāhyaṃ grāhakamapi tadyadvā grāhakaṃ grāhyamapi taditi |
SA01n792:256: rūpādayaḥ pañca viṣayā dharmāyatanaṃ ca saṃprayuktakavarjyam ||
SA01n792:257: dvikoṭikaṃ yatra dve koṭī vyākriyete tadanyāsaṃbhavāt tadyathā skandhasya vyavasthānaṃ dhātuvyavasthānaṃ ca nigamayyocyate - yā skandhasaṃkhyā dhātusaṃkhyāpi sā,
SA01n792:261: tathāhi naiko dhāturasti yaḥ sakalarūpaskandhalakṣaṇo vā syāt sakalavijñānaskandhalakṣaṇo vā |
SA01n792:264: trikoṭikai yatra tistra eva koṭayo vyākriyante |
SA01n792:271: syāt skandhasaṃkhyāyatanasaṃkhyā ca vijñānaskandho manaāyatanaṃ ca |
SA01n792:275: yo vā śrotrendriyeṇa samanvāgataścakṣurindriyeṇāpi sa iti |
SA01n792:280: oṃkāritaṃ yatra praśne vyākaraṇamomiti kriyate evametadityabhyupagamyata ityarthaḥ |
SA01n792:282: ye vā saṃskārāḥ sarve te'nityā iti pṛṣṭena omiti vyākartavyam ||
SA01n792:284: tadyathā skandhavinirmuktāḥ saṃskārāḥ katibhiḥ satyaiḥ saṃgṛhītā iti |
SA01n792:285: prātikṣepikam - na santi skandha vinirmuktāḥ saṃskārā iti ||
SA01n792:312: ete cānupalambhā yat kiṃcidatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ yāvadyadvā dūre yadvā'ntika ityetadanukramānusāreṇa draṣṭavyāḥ ||
SA01n792:314: yo nopalabhate yadyena yasmai yato yasya yatra nopalabhate yāvadvividha ścānupalambha iti ||
SA01n792:330: vinā pūrvābhogena sarveṣvartheṣvābho gasahakālamasaṃ gāpratihatajñāna darśanapravṛtteḥ ||
SA01n792:340: rājakulaṃ yatra rājā svayaṃ saṃnihitaḥ yuktakulaṃ yatra rājñā'dhiyuktāḥ sabhā vaṇik sabhādi |
SA01n792:341: prāmāṇikāḥ sahāyakāḥ yeṣāṃ vacanaṃ vādiprativādinau na saṃśayataḥ |
SA01n792:342: dharmārthakuśalāśca śramaṇabrāhmaṇā ye teṣu śāstreṣu granthataścārthataśca vyutpannabuddhayaḥ ||
SA01n792:343: vādādhiṣṭhānaṃ yadadhiṣṭhāya vādaḥ kriyate tadyathā sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca ||
SA01n792:344: tatra svabhāvaḥ sādhya ātmasvabhāvo dharmasvabhāvaśca nāstīti vāstīti vā ||
SA01n792:345: viśeṣaḥ sādhya ātmaviśeṣo dharmaviśeṣaśca sarvagato na sarvagato nityānityo rūpyarūpītyevamādibhiḥ prakāraiḥ ||
SA01n792:347: sādhyagrahaṇaṃ yadi na kriyeta siddhasyāpi svapakṣasya pareṣāṃ deśanā pratijñā prasajyeta |
SA01n792:348: svarucitārthagrahaṇaṃ na kriyeta parapakṣasyāpi sādhyasya vacanaṃ pratijñā prasajyeta |
SA01n792:349: paragrahaṇaṃ na kriyeta ekākino'pi tadvacanaṃ pratijñā prasajyeta |
SA01n792:350: saṃprāpaṇagrahaṇaṃ na kriyeta kāyenāpi tadarthābhinayanaṃ pratijñā prasajyeta |
SA01n792:351: vijñāpanāgrahaṇaṃ na kriyetā'vijñāte'pi tadarthe śrotṛbhiḥ pratijñā prasajyeta |
SA01n792:352: yathokte tu vyavasthāne sarva ete doṣā na bhavanti,
SA01n792:356: tathāhi pratyakṣā nupalaṃbhādupalaṃbhādvetyanena samākhyānena tasmin sādhye'pratītasyārthasya saṃpratyaya utpadyate |
SA01n792:358: pratyakṣopalaṃbhānupalaṃbhau punaḥ svabhāvaṃ liṅgaṃ cādhikṛtya veditavyau ||
SA01n792:362: yathā sādhyo'rthastribhiravayavaiḥ sādhitastathā śiṣṭānāmapi tajjātīyānāṃ sādhyānāṃ sādhitārthadharmopagamāya nayatvena samākhyānaṃ yuktyā'tideśa upanayaḥ ||
SA01n792:368: sa hyātmā prajñapyamānaḥ skandhalakṣaṇo vā prajñapyeta,
SA01n792:372: tadyadi skandhalakṣaṇastenāsvatantrāḥ skandhāḥ pratītyasamutpannā udagavyayadharmāṇa stallakṣaṇa ātmā nopapadyata iti doṣaḥ |
SA01n792:373: atha skandheṣu tenānityaskandhāśrita ātmā'nityaḥ prāpnotīti doṣaḥ |
SA01n792:374: athānyatra skandhebhyastena nirdehaka ātmā niṣprayojana iti doṣaḥ |
SA01n792:375: athāskandhakastena prakṛtyaiva muktasya kevalino mokṣārthaprayatnavaiyarthyamiti doṣaḥ ||
SA01n792:377: taddhayatītaṃ vidyamānalakṣaṇatvena prajñapyamānaṃ vartamānalakṣaṇaṃ vā prajñapyeta,
SA01n792:378: vartamāne vā anyatra vā vartamānāt vartamānanirapekṣaṃ vā |
SA01n792:380: atha vartamāne tenāniruddhe niruddhātmakasya saṃbandho na yujyata iti doṣaḥ |
SA01n792:381: athānyatra vartamānāttena vartamānaṃ hitvā na kiṃcittadvastūpalabhyate yatra tatprajñapyata iti doṣaḥ |
SA01n792:384: ato'nena vartamānaprajñaptau caturdoṣeṇa siddhenā siddha ātmā nāstīti skandhaprajñaptau caturvidhadoṣopalaṃbhāt prasādhyate nāstīti ||
SA01n792:385: evamātmaviparyāsaṃ pratiṣidhyaitayaiva yuktayā nityādayo'pi na santītyatideśa upanayaḥ ||
SA01n792:386: yasmādetadevaṃ tasmādanityāḥ pañca skandhāḥ yāvadanātmāna iti nigamanamiti ||
SA01n792:389: sadgrahaṇaṃ ghaṭādidravyāṇāṃ loke pratyakṣasaṃmatānāṃ pratyakṣatvavyudāsārtha prajñaptimātratvāt |
SA01n792:393: pratyakṣādyadanyacchiṣṭamapratyakṣaṃ niyamena tatsahavarti prasiddhaṃ draṣṭuḥ pūrva tasya tatpratyakṣamīkṣamāṇasya tadanyasmin śiṣṭasaṃpratyaya utpadyate tenāpyatra bhavitavyametat sahavartineti tatpratyakṣapūrvakamanumānam |
SA01n792:396: yatropadeśe tatpratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca sarvathā na virudhyete na vyabhicarataḥ sa āptāgamaḥ saṃpratyayitvāt ||
SA01n792:397: vādālaṃkāro yena yukto vādī vādaṃ kurvāṇo'tyartha śobhate |
SA01n792:399: tatra svaparasamayajñatā svasiddhāntaṃ parasiddhāntaṃ cārabhya granthataścārthataśca paurvāparyeṇa nirantaraṃ vyutpattiparipākaḥ |
SA01n792:406: tatra kathātyāgo'sādhu mama sādhu tavetyevamādibhiḥ prakāraiḥ svaparavādadoṣaguṇābhyupagamaḥ |
SA01n792:408: yathoktaṃ sūtre - āyuṣmāṃścundikastīrthikaiḥ saha vādaṃ kurvannavajānitvā pratijānāti pratijānitvā'vajānātīti |
SA01n792:424: asthiraṃ yatpratijñāyāvajñātamavajñāya pratijñātamatitvaramāṇayā vācā hi tūrṇaparāmṛṣṭaḥ |
SA01n792:430: akaraṇena vā guṇadoṣau vicārya vādasya nigrahasthānānāsādanāt,
SA01n792:436: tadyathā svaparasamayajñatā vāde bahukaro dharmo yena sarvatra kathā vastuni vādaṃ karoti |
SA01n792:438: kuśalapakṣaprayuktenetyuktvā pratipattisārakeṇeti vacanamāśayaviśuddhijñāpanārtha na lābhasatkārādinimittaṃ śrutādikuśalapakṣe prayuktenetyarthaḥ |
SA01n792:440: evaṃ ca svahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyata ityayameṣāṃ padānāmanusaṃdhirveditavyaḥ |
SA01n792:441: avigṛhyāpi tāvadvāde kriyamāṇe prakṛtigambhīratvānmahāyānadharmasya durlabhā''jñā prāgeva vigṛhya |
SA01n792:442: yaiśca saha vigṛhya vādaḥ kriyate te'pi pratipattāro nājñābhiprāyāḥ pratibruvanti kiṃtarhyupālambhābhiprāyāḥ |
SA01n792:443: yeṣvapi prāśnikeṣu sa vādaḥ kriyate te vā'sabhyā avyutpannā vā bhavantyabhiniviṣṭā vā |
SA01n792:444: sarvo'pi ca vādā prāyeṇa ṣaḍbhirdoṣairyukto bhavati |
SA01n792:445: tathāhi vādaṃ kurvāṇaḥ kadācidatirabhasenāsatpakṣamapi parigṛhyābhiniveśena chalajātinigrahasthānānyapi prayukte |
SA01n792:450: svayaṃ ca teṣu cittaṃ pradūṣayatītyebhiḥ ṣaḍbhirdoṣai ryukto bhavati ||
SA01n792:452: sati cānupaśame durlabhaṃ paracittānurakṣaṇaṃ svacittānurakṣaṇaṃ ca yena pare prasādaṃ labheran vimuktyāyatanayogena svacittaṃ samādhīyate |
SA01n792:453: prāyeṇa vāde kathamahaṃ jayeyaṃ pare parājīyerannityevaṃ cittaṃ samudācarati |
SA01n792:457: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hatvā ityasyāṃ gāthāyāṃ loke yadatyarthamavadyaṃ pātaka tadabhidhāyīnyakṣarāṇyetāni viṃśuddhau pariṇāmitāni |
SA01n792:462: tatra pratiniyato gurujano mātā pitā ca,
SA01n792:484: hīno loke caturvidhaḥ - manaskarmahīnaḥ kāyakarmahīno vākkarmahīna upabhogahīnaśca |
SA01n792:492: upabhogahī naḥ śvā kā kaḥ preto vetyevamādikaḥ,
SA01n792:500: vāntāśo dṛṣṭe dharme upakaraṇabalena kāyaṃ saṃdhā rayato'pi bhogajīvitāśābhāvāditi ||
SA01n792:503: śarīraṃ punarasyāḥ samādhi niśritya bodhisattvā darśanabhāvanāmārgābhyāṃ mahābodhiṃ spṛśantīti ||
SA01n792:513: tatra parameṇa brahmacaryeṇa samanvāgata iti loko ttareṇa mārgeṇetyarthaḥ |
SA01n792:514: nānyatra maithunānmaithunasya niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣata iti tasyaiva yathābhūta parijñānena tatprahāṇāt |
SA01n792:520: maithunapratipakṣeṇa ca dharmeṇottrasyati tatpratipakṣeṇa mārgeṇa sarvasattvottaraṇāya vyavasyatīti kṛtvā |
SA01n792:521: abhīkṣṇaṃ ca dvayadvayaṃ samāpadyate saṃkleśavyavada nadvayena phalahetubhedena catuḥsatyātmakena [śamathavipaśyanādvayena] punaḥpunalaukikalokottaramārgadvayaṃ samāpadyata iti kṛtvā ||
SA01n792:527: ityabhidharmasamuccaye bhāṣyataḥ sāṃkathyaviniścayo nāma pañcamaḥ samuccayaḥ samāptaḥ ||
